 class EvilSemicolonChecker
          Checks for a semicolon after the boolean condition in an if, else if, while, and for statement, or, after the declaration of the main method.
 class FileNameChecker
          Checks to see that the file name matches the class name and that there are no spaces in the filename.

          Checks for mismatched parentheses.
 class PrintlineChecker
          Checks to see if the method printLine is misspelled with a lower-case L, as in 'printline'.
 class SemicolonChecker
          Checks for missing semicolons.
